Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class PageController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.PageController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivateEffectController, CharactersController, CloudController, ConnectionController, DeckController, DisconnectionController, GameBoardController, GameOverController, GameSelectionController, IslandsPageController, SchoolBoardController, SingleIslandController, WaitingRoomController
public abstract class PageController extends Object
The class PageController is an abstract class which all the controllers of the GUI extend. The controllers are connected to an fxml file and handle the graphics and the events generated by the specific scene.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message message)
      The method sendMessage sends an object Message to the GUI's listeners. The only class that listens to the GUI is ServerHandler
      Parameters:
      message - The message that the GUI wants the ServerHandler to receive
      See Also:
      • Message

    • handleErrorMessage

      public void handleErrorMessage(String string)
      The method handlerErrorMessage displays an Alert on the current Scene, describing what the problem is.
      Parameters:
      string - A String explaining the error
